title: Strengthening Mathematical Problem-Solving Competency Through Global Classroom Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of basic mathematical and statistical concepts, with practical application experience
context.additional_context: Integrated instructional design considering multicultural and multinational learner environments, optimized for smartphone-based learning activities

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with peers from diverse cultural backgrounds to solve complex mathematical problems
Learners apply mathematical models to real business scenarios through project-based assessments
Learners establish and execute self-directed learning plans using LMS and mobile platforms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
